fields.review: I have had a watch for many years. I have a few models but I am currently in love with the Timex X Todd Snyder Mk1 model. I have used it for many years and it has performed perfectly. I have worn it on hikes, camping and even skiing and it hasn't skipped a beat. It has great water resistance and the battery life is perfect. I am very happy with this watch and just wanted to let you know that I am a fan of Timex.
